summary: Chulbul Pandey invites a fresh trouble when he kills the brother of a notorious politician and the former swears to wreak havoc in his life.
cast: Salman Khan|Sonakshi Sinha|Prakash Raj|Vinod Khanna|Arbaaz Khan|Deepak Dobriyal|Nikitin Dheer|Mahie Gill|Kareena Kapoor|Sandeepa Dhar|Ram Sujan|Pradeep Chaudhry|Yogendra Tiku|Yugal Kishore|Achyut Potdar|Mukesh Bhatt|Malaika Arora|Tinnu Anand|Madhumita Das|Rashami Desai|Manoj Joshi|Vidyadhar Joshi|Pradeep Kabra|Rajiv Kachroo|Manoj Pahwa|Nitish Pandey|Shravan Sagar|Ravi Sah|Gireesh Sahdev|Flora Saini|Sadat Shamsi|Shayamlal|Nandini Shinde|Nandish Singh|Lokesh Tilakdhari
title: Dabangg 2
